text: Jérôme Déom (born 19 April 1999) is a Belgian footballer who plays for MVV Maastricht, on loan from Standard Liège. He plays as a midfielder. ==Club career== Déom is a youth exponent from Standard Liège. On 7 May 2016, he made his Belgian Pro League debut against Waasland-Beveren. ==References== ==External links== * Belgium profile at Belgian FA * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgium youth international footballers Category:Standard Liège players Category:MVV Maastricht players Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Eerste Divisie players
title: Jérôme Deom
